sentence.Network_en: A large evergreen tree ( Castanopsis chrysophylla ) of the Pacific Coast of North America.
sentence.Network_cn: 锥栗北美洲沿太平洋海岸所产的一种常绿大树 ( 锥栗属金叶树 )

sentence.Network_en: The Castanopsis eyrei community had a striking mone dominant character.
sentence.Network_cn: 群落外貌以小型和中型叶、叶、全缘、质及草质的小、高位芽植物组成为特征.

sentence.Network_en: Furniture made of castanopsis sclerophylla is durable.
sentence.Network_cn: 用苦槠木做的家具挺耐用.
